remarks: The set of linear functionals in a left module or left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lflset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lflset.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lflset.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lflset.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lflset.k $e |- K = ( Base ` D ) $.
lflset.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` D ) $.
lflset.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` D ) $.
lflset.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lflset $p |- ( W e. X -> F = { f e. ( K ^m V ) | A. r e. K A. x e. V A. y e. V ( f ` ( ( r .x. x ) .+ y ) ) = ( ( r .X. ( f ` x ) ) .+^ ( f ` y ) ) } ) $.
$d K f r $.
$d V f x y $.
$d W f r x y $.
